    • Uses of PageObjectContext in com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.ui

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Object> DialogFieldProvider.provideValue(Object pageObject, Field field, PageObjectContext context)
      Looks for DialogField annotation, reads locator data from the annotation instance and asks AemDialogFieldResolver to produce a dialog field instance for the class field.

    • Uses of PageObjectContext in com.cognifide.qa.bb.mapper.field

      This method produces value for the field.
      Optional<Object> PageObjectSelectorListProxyProvider.provideValue(Object pageObject, Field field, PageObjectContext context)
      Produces a proxy that will provide value for the list of PageObjects.
      Optional<Object> PageObjectListProxyProvider.provideValue(Object pageObject, Field field, PageObjectContext context)
      Produces a proxy that will provide value for the list of PageObjects.
      Optional<Object> FieldProvider.provideValue(Object pageObject, Field field, PageObjectContext context)
      PageObjectInjectorListener calls this method to get the value for the injected class field.
      Optional<Object> CurrentFrameProvider.provideValue(Object pageObject, Field field, PageObjectContext context)
      This method returns the current frame path with the type aligned with the injected field.

    • Uses of PageObjectContext in com.cognifide.qa.bb.scope

      Methods in com.cognifide.qa.bb.scope that return PageObjectContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PageObjectContext ContextStack.getCurrentContext(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver)
      This is like peek, but returns the default context when the context stack is empty.
      PageObjectContext ContextStack.peek()
      Return top context from the queue, without removing it.
      PageObjectContext ContextStack.pop()
      Takes the top context object off the queue and returns it.
      Methods in com.cognifide.qa.bb.scope with parameters of type PageObjectContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ContextStack.push(PageObjectContext element)
      Puts context objects on top of the context stack.
